description: You can get the currencies that you set for your site using the backend function [`siteSetting.setCurrencies()`](wix-pay-backend.Currencies.html#sitesettings.setcurrencies). These are the currencies that are displayed in the [currency conversion](https://support.wix.com/en/article/adding-and-setting-up-a-currency-converter-in-wix-stores) element and used to convert currencies in your Wix Store.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - The list of all currencies set for this site.

docs.summary: Gets the list of supported currencies that you set for your site.
description: The `getCurrencies()` function returns a Promise that resolves to an array of currencies that were set for use in the site using the backend function [`siteSetting.setCurrencies()`](wix-pay-backend.Currencies.SiteSettings.html#setCurrencies).
This function is different from the [`getAllCurrencies()`](wix-pay.Currencies.html#getAllCurrencies) function in that it gets only the currencies that have
been set for use in  this site using the [`siteSetting.setCurrencies()`](wix-pay-backend.Currencies.SiteSettings.html#setCurrencies) function.
The [`getAllCurrencies()`](wix-pay.Currencies.html#getAllCurrencies) function gets the complete list of all of the currencies that can be supported.

examples.title: Get currencies that were set for this site.

notes: For SiteSettings functions to work, your site must contain a Wix Stores page including the [currency conversion element](https://support.wix.com/en/article/adding-and-setting-up-a-currency-converter-in-wix-stores).
